title: The Covenant Renewed
summary: Exodus 34 describes how God renews the covenant after the golden calf incident. He gives Moses new stone tablets and reveals His character—gracious and just. Moses returns radiant from God’s presence.

faq.question: What did God reveal about Himself?
faq.answer: That He is compassionate, gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness.

faq.question: What happened to Moses' face after being with God?
faq.answer: It shone with radiance, and he had to wear a veil when speaking to the people.
